QuestData.Title: Every Bit Counts
QuestData.Description: Manduil Skycaller was sent on a sensitive mission to Jorune Mine, but he hasn't returned for hours.$B$BI suspect he requires assistance. I will let him brief you on the situation when you find him, but he is likely deep within the mine.$B$BYou should report to Ageilaa, a local draenei miner who has agreed to cooperate with us in exchange for helping her regain control of the mine.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Ageilaa at the Jorune Mine in Talador.
QuestData.RewardText: Aeun sent you? Help has arrived!
